text: Ta [falao] shuo:“Zai wo zhunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen gan xiangxin ta [mu sa] ma? Ta yiding shi nimen de shouling, yiding shi ta jiaoshou nimen moshu de. Wo yiding yao jiaocuo kan qu nimen de shoujiao, wo yiding yao ba nimen ding si zai ye zao shugan shang, na shi nimen jiu zhidao women zhong shei de xingfa zui yanli, zui chijiu.”
